title: (x) ING Direct footer font - Frutiger {Florian}
content:
Can anybody help me in identifying this font? It's used on the footer of ING Direct statements. Sorry, but I'm a bit of a newbie :)

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20100209213013im_/http:/typophile.com/files/statement_lozenge_3760.gif)

Any help would be really appreciated!

Thanks in advance!  
x Janina
author: s343993

comments.content:
And I reply: Frutiger! :-)  
The dots appear to be square, and the ‘A’ is wider. See also the ‘y’ and the ‘3’ and ‘6’.

Hehehe.

Didn’t really check.  
Just took a quick look and assumed because of probability.

_The dots appear to be square_

Pass on my congratulations to your optometrist, Florian!
Thanks! I'll give those a try... You guys are awesome! :)

Haha!  
@Craig: Well, I wouldn’t have based my judgement solely on the dots. ;-)
